mapper.select: SELECT data_time, area_code, area_name, sum(add_count) as add_count, sum(broadband_count) as broadband_count, round(sum(renewal_count)/sum(add_count),2)*100 as renewal_rate, round(sum(package_count)/sum(add_count),2)*100 as package_rate, round(sum(yung_card_count)/sum(add_count),2)*100 as yung_card_rate, round(sum(assistant_count)/sum(add_count),2)*100 as assistant_rate, round(sum(crm_count)/sum(add_count),2)*100 as crm_rate FROM tb_university_real_hour WHERE data_time=(select max(data_time) from tb_university_real_hour) and (case when #{authCode}='-1' then '-1'='-1' else trim(area_code)=#{authCode} end) GROUP BY data_time, area_code, area_name

SELECT data_time, university_code, university_name, current_is_open, sum(add_count) as add_count, sum(broadband_count) as broadband_count, round(sum(renewal_count)/sum(add_count),2)*100 as renewal_rate, round(sum(package_count)/sum(add_count),2)*100 as package_rate, round(sum(yung_card_count)/sum(add_count),2)*100 as yung_card_rate, round(sum(assistant_count)/sum(add_count),2)*100 as assistant_rate, round(sum(crm_count)/sum(add_count),2)*100 as crm_rate FROM tb_university_real_hour WHERE data_time=(select max(data_time) from tb_university_real_hour) and trim(area_code)=#{areaCode} GROUP BY data_time, university_code, university_name, current_is_open ORDER BY current_is_open DESC

b.acc_plan_count, b.acc_add_count, b.acc_broadband_count, b.acc_renewal_rate, b.acc_package_rate, b.acc_yung_card_rate, b.acc_communicate_rate, b.acc_circle_rate, b.acc_new_rate, b.acc_assistant_rate, renewal_rate, round(sum(package_count)/sum(add_count),2)*100 as package_rate, round(sum(yung_card_count)/sum(add_count),2)*100 as yung_card_rate, round(sum(assistant_count)/sum(add_count),2)*100 as acc_circle_rate, round(sum(add_count)/sum(plan_count),2)*100 as acc_new_rate, round(sum(assistant_count)/sum(add_count),2)*100 as acc_assistant_rate, round(sum(crm_count)/sum(add_count),2)*100 as acc_crm_rate FROM tb_university_accumunate_byuniversity_day WHERE statis_day=(select max(statis_day) from tb_university_accumunate_byuniversity_day) and trim(university_code)=#{universityCode} GROUP BY statis_day,university_code ) b ON trim(a.university_code)=trim(b.university_code)
